titleStmt.title: The death of the tvvo renowned kings of Sweden and Bohemia, happening both in one and the same year and moneth; viz: in November 1632 Publikely lamented in a sermon, held before a princely, noble, and frequent assembly, in the high-Dutch congregation at the Hague by Mr. Frederike Schloer, minister of Gods word. Translated out of the High-Dutch printed coppie.
titleStmt.author: Schloer, Frederike.
T. H., fl. 1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. D[awson] for Nicholas Bourne and are to be sold at his shop, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A lamentation sermon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange
